comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: There was a Stanley N. Doust who was an Austraiian tennis player and Davis Cup team captain around 1913.  Same guy?  (different middle initial).

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: That is him, he matches the images in Corbis from 1913-1914. I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanley_Doust [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/5126473408/]
